pages.text:
Bundled Golf Communities
Back to Golf Communities
In Bundled golf communities, your Golf or Social membership is bundled into the purchase of your home whether it is a single-family home, coach home or condo.
You do not pay an additional upfront “Initiation Fee”. Annual membership dues are required. Every homeowner in the community will be a golf or social member of the club. Explore the bundled golf communities below which are located in Naples, Bonita Springs, Estero and Fort Myers. You’ll find information about the golf course, membership dues and much more. Several bundled golf communities use the Chelsea system for tee times.
If you are looking for a home or condo in a bundled golf community, you will find it is more complex than a normal home purchase. As you can probably imagine, there is a significant difference between golf courses. Also, there are hidden fees, different membership options, pet restrictions and very different demographics in each community.

Results You Can Count On
So, if you are looking for information about a specific community in Bonita Springs, Estero, Fort Myers or Naples, contact us and we will prepare a custom market report for you. Most importantly, we can provide market information and insights to help make sure you select your dream home.
Lastly, we will handle all of the contract negotiations for your property from the first offer to close and help make your real estate transaction as effortless.
The Naples Golf Guy Team, as seen on Forbes, is committed to extraordinary customer service with an emphasis on detail. Professionalism, integrity and discretion are not goals, they are standards. We collaborate with our sellers to design and implement a customized marketing campaign to present your property to the world. If you are a buyer, we are committed to helping you find the community which will allow you to live the ultimate Florida lifestyle in Paradise.

Greater Sarasota Golf Communities
Back to Golf Communities
Discover Golf Communities  and Lifestyles in Greater Sarasota
The Greater Sarasota area is a premier destination for those seeking a blend of luxurious living and world-class golfing. Known for its beautiful beaches, cultural attractions, and vibrant arts scene, Sarasota also boasts some of the finest golf communities in Southwest Florida, offering an exceptional lifestyle for residents.
Living in a golf community means enjoying a vibrant and active lifestyle. These communities are equipped with top-notch amenities, including state-of-the-art clubhouses, fitness centers, swimming pools, tennis courts, pickleball, and gourmet dining options. A busy social calendar featuring events, fitness classes, and recreational activities fosters a strong sense of community and engagement among residents.
The golf communities in Sarasota offer an array of luxurious real estate options, from grand single-family homes and sprawling estate homes to elegant condos and comfortable villas. Many properties are designed with modern amenities and boast stunning views of the golf courses, lakes, and natural surroundings, providing a serene and picturesque living environment.

Need Some Assistance
With so many Naples golf communities to choose from it can be challenging to find the ideal community. There are hundreds of golf condos and golf homes to choose from. Not sure if you should look at an
equity golf community
or a
bundled golf community
? Do you want a club with more than one golf course? Let me help be your guide.
Finally, in just a few minutes, I can provide you with information about communities that will match your lifestyle. Whether you are new to golf or you are an expert multiple golf communities will match your interests.
In addition to
Naples
,
Bonita Springs
,
Ft. Myers
and Greater
Sarasota
also have several great golf communities you might want to explore.
For the latest market numbers for Sarasota golf communities contact me today at 239-370-0892.

Bottom line
Naples, Bonita Springs, and Estero are great places to retire or relocate.  If you are looking for a wide variety of activities, Southwest Florida has something to match everyone’s lifestyle.
When you are ready to purchase your dream home or condo in SWFL, let me be your guide. With almost 20 years of experience, I can help provide the market information and more importantly, provide insights into individual communities to help ensure you select the best property to match your needs.
Contact Naples Golf Guy
About Naples Golf Guy
For expert guidance in Southwest Florida real estate, contact Naples Golf Guy, Matt Klinowski P.A. Whether you’re looking to buy a single-family home or condo in Naples, Bonita Springs, Estero, Ft. Myers or Sarasota I can help. With over 20 years of experience, I offer valuable market information and insights into individual communities to help you find the perfect home and lifestyle in the best golf community to fit your needs. Reach out to me today to get started!
Contact Matt:
Matt@NaplesGolfGuy.com
or at
239-370-0892

naples golf guy team
NAPLES GOLF GUY aka Matthew Klinowski P.A., and his team are Southwest Florida’s top Golf Community Real Estate Experts. From Naples to Sarasota, whether you are buying or selling a home the Naples Golf Guy Team is committed to extraordinary customer service with an emphasis on detail.
Matthew klinowski
Team Leader
Michele klinowski
Team Member
Mackenzie Davis-Mahan
Team Member
Matthew Klinowski
Team Leader
“Top 10 Real Estate Professionals According to Forbes”
With more than 150 golf communities in Southwest Florida, finding the perfect one to call home doesn’t just feel intimidating, it is. Different golf clubs offer different amenities, courses and lifestyles. To discover what truly feels right for you requires an insider’s perspective.
It requires Matt Klinowski, aka The Naples Golf Guy.
Matt and his team are the area’s most trusted resource when it comes to buying and selling golf community homes in southwest Florida. He’s got nearly 20 years of experience, relationships up and down the coast and knows every club like the back of his hand. He’s always ahead of the game, so his clients don’t have to be.
A hard-working entrepreneur, who admittedly is not a “self promoter,” Matt has built a thriving business by combining his passion for golf and real estate. But what it’s really about for him is people. He has a natural ability to connect with his clients and ensures their happiness time and time again. For him, helping someone find their dream home is like chipping in from 40 yards out…only better. He’s not just buying and selling real estate—he’s helping people take the luxury lifestyles they dream of and making them a reality.
In terms of real estate expertise, Matt can “hit every club in the bag”—he deals in condos, single family homes, existing properties, new construction and more.
And, what’s more: there is no separation between “Matt the realtor” and “Matt the person.” Authenticity is his super power.
Matt combines a human-first approach with his natural tendency to hustle, always in service of others. It’s that opportunity to serve that fires him up to go to work everyday—and if he’s being honest, most days it doesn’t feel like work.
With hundreds of satisfied clients, no one knows the southwest Florida terrain better than Matt. So when it comes time to find your dream home at your dream club, call on the best: Matthew Klinowski, The Naples Golf Guy.
Michele Klinowski
Team Member
Michele Klinowski is a dedicated real estate professional serving the Naples, Florida area, where she passionately assists both buyers and sellers in achieving their real estate goals. With a commitment to delivering exceptional service, Michele works tirelessly to ensure her clients experience a stress-free transaction process.
Prior to her real estate career, Michele served as Senior Vice President of the Greater Naples Chamber of Commerce, where she amassed a deep understanding of the local community and its unique offerings. Originally from the Chicago area, Michele’s roots include captaining the women’s golf team at Northwestern University, where she earned a B.A. in economics and continues to contribute as a member of the National Alumni Board of Directors. Her leadership extends to the Greater Naples Northwestern Alumni Board of Directors, where she serving as co-president.
With over 20 years of experience at NewsBank, Michele’s professional journey has taken her across 48 states, yet she firmly believes Naples, Florida, stands out as “Paradise” and has proudly called it home alongside her husband, Matt Klinowski (known as The Naples Golf Guy), for nearly two decades.
Michele holds the designation of RSPS (Resort and Second-Home Property Specialist), highlighting her expertise in catering to the unique needs of buyers and sellers in resort and second-home markets. Her blend of passion, professionalism, and integrity, coupled with an in-depth knowledge of the Naples area, ensures that clients receive top-notch guidance and support throughout their real estate endeavors.
Whether you’re buying or selling in Naples, Michele Klinowski’s dedication and expertise make her the ideal partner to navigate the Naples real estate market and achieve your desired outcomes.
Mackenzie Davis
Team Member
Mackenzie Davis-Mahan is a dedicated real estate professional born and raised in Sarasota, Florida, with an intimate knowledge of every corner of Southwest Florida. Known for her tireless work ethic and unwavering commitment to client satisfaction, Mackenzie’s primary goal is ensuring her clients’ happiness throughout their real estate journey.
Whether it’s identifying the best golf course based off of each players personal preferences, identifying the golf community with vibrant social activities, or finding a spacious home that accommodates everyone during holidays, Mackenzie excels in navigating the details to locate the perfect property for her clients
With a strong financial background and expertise in analyzing CAP rates, ROI, and NOI for various property types, investors can trust Mackenzie to provide sound advice and strategic insights. Her educational foundation includes completing the International Baccalaureate program and earning a bachelor’s degree in Business Finance from Florida Gulf Coast University.
Mackenzie’s approach to real estate transactions is characterized by meticulous organization and attention to detail, ensuring a seamless and stress-free experience for her clients. Whether you’re buying or selling, Mackenzie Davis is dedicated to helping you achieve your real estate goals with confidence and excitement.
In her spare time, Mackenzie enjoys exploring the vibrant cultural scene and natural beauty of Southwest Florida, further enhancing her appreciation and understanding of the area she proudly calls home.

Equity Golf Communities
Back to Golf Communities
The majority of Equity Golf Communities have converted to a non-equity membership model and now require an up-front “Initiation Fee” for your golf membership.
Also, you will be required to pay annual membership dues which vary significantly between clubs. The amount of equity (if any) also varies by club. Many private golf clubs in Southwest Florida used to include equity in the golf club. However, most clubs have shifted to a model with an up-front non-refundable initiation fee with no equity stake in the golf club. If needed, some clubs may offer payment terms for the initiation fee.
In general, private golf club memberships include the social benefits of the community in addition to full golf privileges. In certain instances, there are alternative membership options such as a
“Social” or “Sports” membership
. These alternative memberships include access to social activities and amenities of the club throughout the entire year. Additionally, some social or sports memberships allow golf privileges during the summer months (May 1st through October 31st).

Need some Assistance
So if you are considering buying your dream home in a private golf club in Naples, Bonita Springs, Estero, Fort Myers, Venice, Bradenton, Sarasota or Lakewood Ranch contact us for additional information about the clubs.
With more than 200 golf communities to navigate, it can be challenging to identify which one will be a good fit for you and your family. We can help narrow the list down to the communities that will suit your lifestyle.
Whether you are buying an existing property or new construction, we will account for every detail. Also, we will manage all contract negotiations to ensure your real estate transaction is effortless.
As golf community experts, our understanding of equity golf communities is unmatched by any other team. If you are ready to buy your own slice of paradise, contact the Naples Golf Guy today!
For more information about Equity Golf Communities
contact Matt Klinowski at 239-370-0892.
